```pddl
[(:action manage_resource
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?resource - object ?location - location ?tool - object)
    :precondition (and 
                    (available ?actor)
                    (or (in_inventory ?actor ?resource)
                        (at ?resource ?location))
                    (or (open ?location)
                        (empty ?location))
                    (not (managed ?resource ?location)))
    :effect (and 
              (managed ?resource ?location)
              (not (in_inventory ?actor ?resource)))),
              
(:action choose
    :parameters (?entity - agent ?target - target)
    :precondition (and
                    (not (chosen ?entity ?target))
                    (available ?entity))
    :effect (and
              (chosen ?entity ?target)
              (not (unselected ?target)))),
              
(:action lay
  :parameters (?entity - agent ?resource - object ?location - location)
  :precondition (and 
                  (available ?entity) 
                  (has ?entity ?resource) 
                  (at ?entity ?location)
                  (not (organized ?resource)) 
                  (state ?location neutral))
  :effect (and 
            (organized ?resource) 
            (not (has ?entity ?resource)))),
            
(:action roll
  :parameters (?actor - agent ?object - object)
  :precondition (and
                  (precondition1 ?object)
                  (precondition2 ?actor))
  :effect (and
            (changed_state1 ?object)
            (changed_state2 ?actor))),
            
(:action wash
    :parameters (?entity - agent ?item - object ?location - location)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?entity ?location) 
        (not (processed ?item))
        (or 
            (inventory ?entity ?item)
            (location ?item in_waste_basket)
            (moisture ?item dry)
            (mixed ?item ?entity)
        )
    )
    :effect (and 
        (processed ?item)
        (or 
            (clean ?item)
            (sealed ?item)
            (moisture ?item wet)
            (knowledge ?entity selected)
            (location ?item in_tumbler)
        ))),
        
(:action use
  :parameters (?actor - agent ?resource - object ?location - location)
  :precondition (and 
                  (has ?actor ?resource) 
                  (at ?actor ?location) 
                  (prepared ?resource))
  :effect (and
            (used ?resource) 
            (task_completed ?actor ?location) 
            (not (has ?actor ?resource)))),
            
(:action initiate
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?target - object)
    :precondition (and (ready ?actor) (condition ?target initial))
    :effect (and (condition ?target activated) (state ?actor engaged))),
    
(:action balance
 :parameters (?entity - agent ?resource - object ?condition - condition ?time - time)
 :precondition (and (location ?resource out_of_place) 
                    (cleanness ?entity clean) 
                    (time ?time earlier)
                    (not (balanced ?entity ?resource ?condition ?time)))
 :effect (and (cleanness ?entity dirty)
              (fullness ?resource fuller)
              (time ?time later)
              (completion ?time finished)
              (balanced ?entity ?resource ?condition ?time))),
              
(:action watch
    :parameters (?entity - object)
    :precondition (and (observable ?entity) (inconsistent ?entity))
    :effect (and (consistent ?entity) (not (inconsistent ?entity)))),
    
(:action keep
  :parameters (?entity - object ?state1 - state ?state2 - state)
  :precondition (and (in_state ?entity ?state1) (condition ?entity))
  :effect (and (in_state ?entity ?state2) (not (in_state ?entity ?state1)))),
  
(:action inquire
  :parameters (?npc - agent ?location - location ?item - object)
  :precondition (and (at ?npc ?location) (source_location ?location))
  :effect (and (inventory ?npc ?item) (not (at ?item ?location)))),
  
(:action visit
    :parameters (?npc - agent ?location - location ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (at ?npc ?location) (location_type ?location))
    :effect (and (inventory ?npc ?item) (not (at ?item ?location)))),
    
(:action determine
:parameters (?entity - agent ?subject - object)
:precondition (and (knowledge ?entity ?subject unselected))
:effect (knowledge ?entity ?subject selected)),
  
(:action compost
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - compostable ?from - location ?to - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?agent ?from) (location ?item ?from))
  :effect (and (location ?item ?to))),
  
(:action contact
  :parameters (?npc - agent ?location - location ?resource - object)
  :precondition (and (at ?npc ?location) (resource_source ?location))
  :effect (and (inventory ?npc ?resource) (not (at ?resource ?location)))),
  
(:action be
    :parameters (?entity - agent ?location - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?entity ?location) (collaborative ?location))
    :effect (shared_resources ?entity ?location)),
    
(:action in
 :parameters (?entity - object ?location - location)
 :precondition (and (at ?entity ?source) (not (in ?entity ?location)))
 :effect (and (in ?entity ?location) (not (at ?entity ?source))))]
```
